summary:
Amazon Web Services (AWS) offers cloud computing services to people and organizations. It lets them use virtual computers and other resources over the internet, paying only for what they use. AWS handles the technical details, so users don't need to worry about managing hardware.

One popular service is EC2, which provides virtual computers with powerful capabilities. These "computers" have CPUs, GPUs, memory, storage, and software, just like real ones. AWS has data centers worldwide, ensuring fast and reliable access.

AWS is very popular, with a big market share, as it helps users save money and time on building their own computer systems.
title: Amazon Web Services
